Message:
We traveled across
many worlds on our journey.

There were worlds just like ours,
and ones with completely
different cultures.

Some worlds were ruled
by witches, while others were
so beautiful it felt like we’d
stumbled upon a miracle!

Each world had been
left in ruins by demons,
so our quest was no picnic...

But, as we overcame
the dangers in our path,
the bonds tying us together
grew even stronger!

Those days were so much fun,
it all felt like a dream!

Of course, our mission never
slipped our minds though.

The Hero of the Staff
protected all of us,
while the Hero of the Lance
slayed the demons in our path.

Me, Elaine, and the other witches
were the two Heroes’ support
as they fulfilled their destinies.

Since we’d done
all that tedious training,
our formation was
absolutely perfect,
I’ll have you know!
But, we still had no idea...

what true horrors demons
were capable of.
